definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: A rose is a perennial shrub or vine.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰是一種常青灌木或藤本植物。

sentences.english: Hoist the plant, for long stretches the vines generations.
sentences.chinese: 葫蘆本爲藤本植物，藤蔓綿延則寓意萬代綿長。
柔弱的木質藤本植物，莖四棱。

sentences.english: Up to a quarter of all the woody growth in some rainforests may be lianas .
sentences.chinese: 在熱帶雨林中的木本植物近四分之一爲藤本植物。

sentences.english: In the back yard a pergola is constructed to protect against the blazing sun.
sentences.chinese: 在後院栽種了一棵藤本植物，來遮擋強烈的陽光。

sentences.english: Makino, belonging to the family of Cucurbitaceae, is a kind of Chinese traditional medicinal herb.
sentences.chinese: 屬葫蘆科絞股藍屬的多年生草質藤本植物。

definition: Arecaceae or Palmae, the palm family
Asteraceae or Compositae (composites), a large family of dicotyledonous plants producing scents, includes aster, daisy and sunflower
Myrtaceae (family including myrtle, rosemary, oregano etc)
Euphorbiaceae (plant family including rubber and cassava)
tree, esp. with recognizable trunk (as opposed to 灌木[guan4 mu4], bush or shrub)
